ssr-prerender.description: Pre-render content on server side if using SSR (use it to pre-render above the fold content)
ssr-prerender.description_zh: 如果使用 SSR，则在服务器端预渲染内容（使用它来预渲染首屏内容）

root.description: [Intersection API root prop] Lets you define an alternative to the viewport as your root (through its DOM element); It is important to keep in mind that root needs to be an ancestor of the observed element
root.description_zh: [交集 API 根属性]允许您将视口的替代方案定义为根（通过其 DOM 元素）;重要的是要记住，根需要是观察到的元素的祖先

margin.description: [Intersection API rootMargin prop] Allows you to specify the margins for the root, effectively allowing you to either grow or shrink the area used for intersections
margin.description_zh: [交集 API rootMargin 属性]允许您指定根的边距，从而有效地允许您增大或缩小用于相交的区域

threshold.description: [Intersection API threshold prop] Threshold(s) at which to trigger, specified as a ratio, or list of ratios, of (visible area / total area) of the observed element
threshold.description_zh: [交集 API 阈值属性]触发阈值，指定为观察到元素（可见面积/总面积）的比率或比率列表

transition-duration.description_zh: 转换持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

disable.description: Disable visibility observable (content will remain as it was, visible or hidden)
disable.description_zh: 禁用可见性可观察（内容将保持原样，可见或隐藏）
